QuestData.Title: Busting Blues
QuestData.Description:
Malygos left behind forces to monitor us while we slept. He's gone, but his minions are still here, making life difficult for everyone.
Scouts have seen them using Arcane Foci. I think we could make better use of them. Go collect some. Their security forces might put up a fight, but that won't be a problem for you, will it?
<Cinderthresh snorts.>
Maybe they'll take the hint and leave.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Arcane Foci from Blue Security forces in the Old Weyrn grounds.
